live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39415.summary: Some customers in in the Highway 11 area of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to their  Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39415.title: July 10 – Abbotsford (Highway 11 surroundings) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
